name: Cev The Crim
description:
A 2D Platformer where you play as Cev the Crim. His next big score!? The museum. Break through the warehouse and gallery to the Egyptian exhibit to see what is awaiting you! Collect the gems to complete your heist!

This is a game for the LudwigJam hosted by Ludwig and Ottomated.

Controls:  (No Mouse)

Keyboard:

  • Left: A, Left Arrow
  • Right: D, Right Arrow
  • Jump: W. Space, Up Arrow
  • Slide: D, Down Arrow
  • Open Menu: Escape
  • Select Menu Item: Enter

Game Pad (Mapped off xbox controler):

  • Left: Stick, DPad
  • Right: Stick, DPad
  • Jump: B, X 
  • Slide: A
  • Open Menu: Start, Y
  • Select Menu Item

Game Design, Programming, Zemeck  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCS7rHXpFNnLXPeNy2BfGjfw  https://www.twitch.tv/zemeck https://discord.gg/SFQsk9yY
